ygData.subject: RE: New Lambent Armor stats
ygData.msgSnippet: The reason you get int and wis on bard things is so that you can learn pottery and tailoring better and faster when you get to be level 50 and have a whole lot
ygData.messageBody:
The reason you get int and wis on bard things is so that you can learn
pottery and tailoring better and faster when you get to be level 50 and have
a whole lot of time on your hands.

Sylly

From: Greg Gillan [mailto:GGillan@...]

To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] New Lambent Armor stats

From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>

(forgive the sarcasm <grin>)


Elwyn Heartstring
Level 47 Bard
Erollisi Marr
